memos.name: Proofs for the Spring-Autumn Kingdom0
memos.title: Spring-Autumn Proofs
memos.text:
A messenger hawk drops a letter onto your head, which is lightly perfumed bears a wax seal. It reads:

"We have received word of the rapid growth of your settlement, which lies near to routes often used by our trading parties. We, with authority vested by our august Emperor, seek a trading partnership for our mutual benefit."

memos.name: Proofs for the Spring-Autumn Kingdom1
memos.title: Spring-Autumn Proofs
memos.text:
"Please see the attached list of requisite goods to prove your settlement's sufficient advancement. Note that these are yours to keep, their production alone is adequate proof. With all deserved regard,

Ibadan, his Spring-Autumn Majesty's Seventh Seneschal of Trade"

c1c1b3d1cc3d0b13.name: Samannoud
c1c1b3d1cc3d0b13.title: of ten thousand paths
c1c1b3d1cc3d0b13.description: A bevy of scars, sun-bleached hair, and a fondness for cats. You've known |name| as long as you can remember.

8547d914f5d4255f.name: Guangzhou
8547d914f5d4255f.title: the Foxfire Heretic
8547d914f5d4255f.description: |name| has been ejected from the Foxfire Ascetics, although there's no explanation as to why. But there are clues: a fierce glint in the eyes, and decidedly non-traditional views on alcohol consumption.

467650e2c639cf3b.name: Da Nang
467650e2c639cf3b.title: the Shuddering Refuge
467650e2c639cf3b.description: You don't see many physical scars, but |name| and company are a downcast and solumn group. Their nightly singing as the sun goes down is one of the most sorrowful things you've ever heard.

leader.name: Samannoud

67eeb7bc.name: Creating Dried Material
67eeb7bc.description: The Firefly wants to watch while your town makes "Dried-sorts-of-things".
67eeb7bc.finishText: The Firefly watched closely while your town produced Thatch, Mud Bricks, Brownstone Bricks, and Red Bricks. Its body language isn't easy to read, but from the way it bobs from side to side you think it's satisfied. Afterwards you find a small reward in the lovely smelling box in front of your Study, including a light that defies explanation.
67eeb7bc.subtitle: Firefly's Curiosity

Mysticism: A Thrice Locked Tome.name: A Thrice Locked Tome
Mysticism: A Thrice Locked Tome.description: To unlock the tome you'll need to find the matching keys and repair them with guidance from Guangzhou.
Mysticism: A Thrice Locked Tome.finishText: The keys gleam with a red light, and the tome sits in front of you.

tasks.label: Find the three Broken Red Keys.
Repair them into three working Red Keys.

Mysticism: A Thrice Locked Tome.subtitle: Mysticism

conversationBegins.name: Foxfire Heretic: Opening the Tome
conversationBegins.title: Opening the Tome
conversationBegins.statementName: Foxfire Heretic: Opening the Tome - s0

Mysticism: A Ruined Red Metal.name: A Ruined Red Metal
Mysticism: A Ruined Red Metal.description: Both the tome and its red clasps are ancient; you'll need to analyze newly forged metals to determine what they're made of.
Mysticism: A Ruined Red Metal.finishText: You've analyzed all the metals you could find, time to combine your findings.

tasks.label: Analyze a sample of Crude Iron.

Mysticism: A Ruined Red Metal.subtitle: Mysticism

conversationBegins.name: Foxfire Heretic: A Ruined Red Metal
conversationBegins.title: A Ruined Red Metal
conversationBegins.statementName: Foxfire Heretic: A Ruined Red Metal - s0
